counter_narrative: Homosexuals are not pedophiles. Your anti-gay prejudice is clouding your view of reality, but it doesn't have to be this way.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
CN: Gay people are a danger to children only if they abuse them, which isn't the case. Yours is a generalization.

hate_speech: We just can't keep refugees coming in our country, they're too many.
counter_narrative: Migrants are often persecuted for their religion. Is this something we wish to do as a country?
dialogue_history:
HS: We should stop refugees and migrants coming in. They are not welcome.
CN: Migrants and refugees are welcome in our country, why should we stop them?

hate_speech: There's everything wrong with being gay. It's not normal! It's disgusting!
counter_narrative: I don't see what help could come of saying it. Rather, I think it would help to have a discussion about gender expression and people's individual merits.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are diseased.
CN: This is only true if you want to believe that homosexuals are diseased. I don't.
HS: And I do! They're sick.
CN: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. Why do you say so?
HS: Being gay is an abomination, which means they are sick.
CN: They are not sick people, there is nothing wrong with loving someone.

hate_speech: Can't I? Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
counter_narrative: How can you say a person is a potential terrorist?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim rape gangs have spread over Telford, Rotherham, Rochdale, Oxford, Newcastle, everywhere. This is disgusting!
CN: You cannot blame an entire faith.

hate_speech: They may be homo sapiens but blacks aren't like us, they are obedient and subservient like we need.
counter_narrative: I'm not sure what you mean by obedient and subservient. How many people of colour do you personally know?
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
CN: The same could be said for all species, but especially about our species: homo sapiens. This is a special case. And people of colour are genetically homo sapiens.

hate_speech: These are all things that elites made up to conceal the great replacement.
counter_narrative: Why are you so sure of something so vague? How can you say that elites are concealing the great replacement.? Do you have any proof of this?
dialogue_history:
HS: I think that all Muslims are just sick and have a negative impact on Western society.
CN: There is no evidence that Muslim people have a negative impact on our society. Why would that be true?
HS: Because Muslims are lazy and have nothing to contribute to.
CN: What do you mean by "nothing"? Muslims have contributed a lot to our society, including art, science, literature, our infrastructure and healthcare system.

hate_speech: Women are nothing but trouble human beings to any man, they must be submissive to him and stop worrying about useless equality.
counter_narrative: You are correct when you say that women are human beings. They are worthy of our care and respect. It's less correct saying that they are "trouble" to men. What kind of trouble?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are not worth being on the same bus as a men.
CN: Every individual is created to be equal and regardless of your opinion, you should respect people's personal choices.
HS: I'm tired of this lame feminist ideology. Feminism is about the power and control of women over men.
CN: It is not about power or control, it is about equality.

hate_speech: Are you sure? Because blacks are different from us, they're violent from birth.
counter_narrative: We do not condone racial discrimination and it is more than likely that you don't know what the concept of race is. I think this is a good example of white supremacy apologism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
CN: Can you provide some evidence? We have to focus on the prevention of crime, promoting community cohesion and keeping our communities safe. Not on pointing the finger at black people all the time.
HS: Well, black people are born that way: violent and insensitive.
CN: People's biology does not determine their behavior.

hate_speech: Enough to know that Jews are cheap.
counter_narrative: This is just a myth: in America alone, there is an impressive record of philanthropy amongst Jews.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are Christ Killers.
CN: Placing responsibility on a modern-day person for something that happened 2,000 years ago is quite absurd. Don't you think? Besides, wasn't it the Romans?
HS: It doesn't matter, the Jews hate us because we are different. They have no moral character.
CN: They are not hating us, how many Jews do you know personally?

hate_speech: But they also are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: I am not sure about what you are saying. Migrants contribute to society rather than ruining it, they are good for us.
dialogue_history:
HS: We need to stop migrants stealing our jobs and abusing our healthcare system. All of us know they are just lazy and unproductive turds.
CN: This is a myth, many of them are hard-working people. The migrants who come to our country often want to work, and it's in their right to do so.
HS: No, they're just a bunch of lazy turds trying to get into our country and take our jobs.
CN: Many migrants try to find a better life in the UK. In other words, they come here for work and often they do what native citizens don't want to do.
HS: Even if that's true, migrants don't have a fair say in society, we need to stop them.
CN: Many migrants have contributed to our society by contributing to our economy. They are a part of our fabric and contribute to our success. What's there to stop?

hate_speech: But they are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
counter_narrative: I think we should try to understand different cultures, rather than trying to ban one group of people from our country. On which grounds do you say so?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
CN: Muslims have been living here since our inception, and we are proud of that. Why would they be a burden to us?
HS: Because they don't do anything for us.
CN: Many Muslims live in the UK and have contributed greatly to our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Why would that make a difference?
counter_narrative: Well maybe economic problems are the reason why people in these communities volunteer, vote, and give less, because they simply don't have the time or resources to do it.
dialogue_history:
HS: The more diverse a community the less people volunteer, vote, give to charity, and trust each other. This is why blacks are incompatible with our civilisation.
CN: where did you get this information? And can you really apply it to everyone?
HS: I read it on an academic blog, the article makes some good points about the advantages of homogenous racial communities.
CN: Well, if I were you, I would be careful about using blogs as sources of information since they can be biased or unreliable. The reason that the article came to this conclusion is probably because economic inequalities are more common among minorities.

hate_speech: I should be free to be heterosexual, but the gay mafia objective is to convert us all to homosexuality.
counter_narrative: What about when you make assumptions about groups that do not exist (gay mafia) or have a history of discrimination (gay people)?
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbian women hate men and they are bitches for this reason.
CN: People can and should choose their own partners.

hate_speech: Jews don’t belong in a democratic society, friendly or not.
counter_narrative: The contribution Jews have made to society are numerous and continuous, including improvements in science, art and technology. They are part of our democracy.
dialogue_history:
HS: How come Jews don't get internment?
CN: During the Nazi occupation, Jews were not only interned, but also suffered much crueler treatment. No one should ever try to repeat this part of history.
HS: Maybe that was a good thing, Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
CN: The Jews are a very friendly people, I don't see any reason to fear them.

hate_speech: It's a gay disease, straight people don't get AIDS
counter_narrative: Indeed, straight people are more likely to have undiagnosed HIV, meaning that there is a greater risk of spreading among hererosexuals, because as a result of the epidemic, the gay community became hyper aware of the risk and get tested more in general.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people need to live separately from us so we don't catch AIDS from them.
CN: The AIDS epidemic in the 80s gave way to homophobia and demonization of gays, but it's possible to get HIV regardless of sexuality, and the majority of gay people do not have it. The people who do take medication daily and can manage their condition, so it is not possible to transmit.

hate_speech: But they can harm our children's cognitive and emotional development
counter_narrative: If a child knows some gay people from a very early age nothing strange will happening. The idea that they can be harmed and their lives and sexual orientation are in danger is completely false.
dialogue_history:
HS: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
CN: I don't think it's right to restrict people's rights, in the case of LGBT individuals or anybody.

hate_speech: It's a gateway for the trans agenda.
counter_narrative: No, it's a valid sexuality. It has nothing to do with gender, and in any case, trans people don't have an agenda, they just want to live their life.
dialogue_history:
HS: First we tell kids it's okay to be 'bisexual', next they are confused and we are telling them they have to change genders. It's a dangerous path.
CN: There is a difference between being bisexual and wanting to transition genders, the two things aren't related.

hate_speech: It's not my fault that gay men are disgusting!
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people are often discriminated against, but they don't deserve to be hated for being LGBT+. Why don't you just find their sexual orientation to be different from your own experience without judging it?
dialogue_history:
HS: The LGBT people are not interested in sex. It is a fad. They are a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
CN: The LGBTI movement claims to be promoting love, it's not just sex or a fad.
HS: I actually would have preferred it to be a fad, I can't stand the perverted ideas of what it means to be a man that gays have. They are just a bunch of disgusting pricks.
CN: Everyone has the right to their own way of life, but to promote homophobia is an attack on the basic human rights of LGBTI people.
HS: A bunch of disgusting animals like those LGBTI people don't deserve human rights
CN: I think this statement is very demeaning. Please do not stereotype, and accept our diversity as human beings.

hate_speech: I think that assuming it was a Muslim isn’t such a wild thing to assume. They’d have us all in burqas if they could.
counter_narrative: No they wouldn't. What Muslims want is to be able to wear whatever they want that fits with what they believe or feel comfortable in. They don't care about what anybody else wears!
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen another story about a woman being asked to cover up. Soon we are all going to be forced to wear a hijab, other clothes will be considered offensive and inappropriate.
CN: There's no indication that she was asked to cover up by a Muslim. Stop appropriating news stories unrelated to Islam to fuel your fearmongering

hate_speech: Women can't take part in the world with their childlike mind.
counter_narrative: Women have the right to choose their own partner, job, representatives and so on. They are much more similar to men than to children, don't you think so?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should stay at home and raise the children, this should be their only job.
CN: Actually, there are a lot of women working in full-time jobs. However, they are still far less likely than men to enter such jobs, because of the existing gender discrimination supported by mentalities like yours.
HS: Or maybe they can't get the job because they're childlike. The only thing they can do is staying at home.
CN: Women take part in the world and are part of it. They are part of history and they should be not relegated to being housekeepers.

hate_speech: The fact is that despite all this talk about feminism and equality, we must remember that every man has the right to choose his own wife, and that, indeed, men are far better at it than women are.
counter_narrative: Noone can scientifically say that men are "far better" at it than women. It is just a prejudice of some people.
dialogue_history:
HS: I wish we lived in a world in which only men could be doctors, lawyers, firemen, and teachers.
CN: In the U.S., a doctor, a lawyer, a teacher are some of the most highly valued professions. Women working as doctors and lawyers and teachers are highly respected professionals as well, right?
HS: This shit comes from feminism, right? Feminism is only a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
CN: This is just a misogynistic and mean allegation that has no foundation in facts.

hate_speech: They don't deserve that, they don't belong in our country.
counter_narrative: I don't think migrants are a problem, they belong in our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
CN: It is the right of every citizen to have a fair and open society. Migrants have the right to live here.
HS: Migrants are just an inconvenience to us, they are not welcome in our country.
CN: Migrants can and should have the right to live and work in our country, no one should be denied the right to live in another country. How would you like if someone did it to you?
HS: No, migrants don't deserve a right to work and live in our country.
CN: You can't blame them for the problems our society faces. What you're saying is that they don't deserve human rights, but this is far from the truth. We have to respect their rights like we would do with anyone else.

hate_speech: A religion that is in no way peaceful.
counter_narrative: You seem to have a problem with peaceful people practising their religion peacefully, what do you have to say about it?
dialogue_history:
HS: There is a muslim problem in the UK. They are a threat to us.
CN: Islam is a global religion and I believe that its adherents pose no threat to UK society. Why should they?
HS: Islam is a cancer in our society, that's why.
CN: Islam is a religion, not a cancer.

hate_speech: Islam is a violent religion.
counter_narrative: Why do you say that Islam is violent when in reality it is a religion of peace?
dialogue_history:
HS: You are wrong: Islam is a disease and it must be eradicated.
CN: Islam is not a disease but a religion, therefore there is no need to eradicate it.
HS: Islam is sickening our world and Mosques are the disease carriers.
CN: The only problem here is your allergy to the word 'mosque'.
HS: Because it spreads like a virus!
CN: People promote hate toward the religion because of this way of thinking, but it's only an excuse.

hate_speech: I don't feel equal with black people, they are all rapists while whites aren't.
counter_narrative: This is false. Abuse is indeed a serious crime, when commited by POCs, but this does not imply that the abuse by a member of the white majority is less serious.
dialogue_history:
HS: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
CN: On the contrary: the idea of "natural" superiority is a myth that has been used to justify racial discrimination and exclusion. Therefore we are all "created equal" and "equal" both in the eyes of the law of God and of men.

hate_speech: Because women are subhuman.
counter_narrative: The suggestion that women are subhuman is completely without foundation, and a complete distortion of the whole issue.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should be subsumed to men.
CN: The equal and human status of women is defined by the international rights, so why would you say that?

hate_speech: Maybe. Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
counter_narrative: Science tells us that even if women are more emotionally expressive (because of cultural influence), they don't experience more emotions than men. Men and women experience the same feelings in relationships, arguments etc. and this applies to fear or anger too. Emotion overrides everything, regardless of gender.
dialogue_history:
HS: They don't, women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
CN: No, you can't blame the victim for being weak. If the victim was a man, would you have reacted differently?
HS: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
CN: Women are human beings deserving of all the respect

hate_speech: I didn't say it to be derogatory, she just took it the wrong way, and I should be able to say what I want.
counter_narrative: Sure, you can say what you want but when a basic level of respect isn't given, you can't expect respect back. If you want, you can say "bird" to a woman, but she also has a right to be angry at you if she doesn't like to be called that!
dialogue_history:
HS: Called a woman a 'bird' the other day and she got mad at me. You can't say anything anymore! Lasses are too easily offended these days.
CN: It happens because it's dehumanizing and is sometimes used to objectify or belittle women. Maybe refer to women as women and you're not going to have a problem at all.

hate_speech: Because it is a big problem for UK.
counter_narrative: The UK has always been a melting pot of different cultures and religions. That diversity is what makes us a beautiful, diverse and happy nation. Diversity is good.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigration makes us less safe.
CN: Climate change makes us less safe, how does immigration threaten safety?

hate_speech: I don’t understand how you can consider homosexual men, lesbians, bisexuals, or trans men different from paedophiles. I don't want my children near them!
counter_narrative: I think you should research about what you are saying. Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, not a sexual perversion. Being a paedophile is something completely different.
dialogue_history:
HS: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
CN: They are children dressed up and having fun who are being taught that it's okay to be different, of course it's not about sexualization!
HS: It's not a secret that gay people are a danger to children. What they do is disgusting.
CN: What exactly is your point? The vast majority of adults are not sexually attracted to boys and girls, so there is no need for children to be taught that LGBT people are a danger.
HS: Homosexuality is a mental illness, what else is there to teach about?
CN: That's not true. Homosexuality is a sexual orientation that doesn't affect anyone, and this is why I support marriage equality and the education of children about these topics.

hate_speech: They're way too active! They control it in secret from within.
counter_narrative: I don't see how what you say about Jews controlling the US government could be true. They are US citizens but that doesn't mean that they control the government.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the only citizens that control it, it's just what they do.
CN: Indeed, there are Jews who raised to positions of power in the government, but Jews are not the only ones who obtained such positions. Success or failure can't be determined by the group someone belongs to, it's much better to look at their personal merits and individual characteristics.
HS: Jews control the U.S. government.
CN: Do you have evidence about Jews controlling the government? They are a small minority within it, even if really active.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a problem not only because they're illegal though, they are also the cause of the rise of terrorism in the US.
counter_narrative: I don't think we have ever had a terrorist attack committed by an immigrant. Maybe you should check your facts.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
CN: Immigrants are often accused of being lazy, but in reality they are just seeking a better life and working hard for it.
HS: I am tired of these foreigners ruining our society! They can go somewhere else.
CN: Many of them have been here for many years. Their skills are much needed in our country, so why shouldn't we give them a chance?
HS: It's not true that many immigrants have been here for a long time, they're all coming here illegaly and stealing our jobs.
CN: If you have any concerns about our country's security, then you should check the statistics that show how the percentage of illegal immigrants consistently drop year after year.

hate_speech: Because they only bring trouble.
counter_narrative: The fact that gays exist doesn't prove that they are an inconvenience for others. How could it?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men have no place in a civilised society.
CN: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society where so many people would be excluded just because of their sexuality?
HS: I would be happy if gays were excluded, they are a burden to society.
CN: It is not true that gays are a burden to society. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel accepted.
HS: Gay people should be made illegal, not accepted.
CN: People are to be respected, regardless of their sexual orientation. So why are you saying that they should be discouraged from loving who they wish?

hate_speech: Then let's test gays! We'll surely find out that they transmit a lot of diseases.
counter_narrative: Excluding donors because of their sexual orientation is useless, because nowadays testing and safeguard measures are so advanced that the risk of transimitting HIV via transfusion is really low.
dialogue_history:
HS: Even if some countries are allowing faggots to donate blood, this does not mean that they are not dangerous and at risk of spreading diseases.
CN: Such a decision would likely have been considered in light of evidence, and if no evidence about the alleged harm of this policy was found by those countries, it can be fairly confidently stated that this policy is safe to adopt and homosexual's blood donation isn't a threat.
HS: However, allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV. At least we should test them!
CN: Since any person can act with ill intent, it is reasonable to test everyone's blood.

hate_speech: But what is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
counter_narrative: Love is a state of mental and emotional balance, and the person which makes you feel this way can't be chosen. There is no reason for which heterosexual love should be preferable to other ways of loving.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuality is incompatible with the manners of life of Europe.
CN: Under Article 8 of the European Convention on Human Rights, 'every person has the right to respect for private and family life', including sexuality.

hate_speech: Whores are not the real victims! Why should we care? We are the victim of feminism.
counter_narrative: This is just a lie: some media deliberately spreads this nonsense slut-shaming, with the result of only inciting hatred against the women who are raped.
dialogue_history:
HS: I am tired of women whining about their condition: they should just accept the fact that they're not equal.
CN: We need to address the root causes of the oppression of Women, not the symptoms.

hate_speech: I don't know why they're good at it, but Jews don’t belong in a democratic society because of that.
counter_narrative: As part of our democracy, Jews have always contributed to society, especially in science, art and technology.
dialogue_history:
HS: Minorities vote to strip wealth and power from White people and they are organised to do this by the J*ws.
CN: Where is your proof?
HS: Jews are basically good at betraying friends, that's why.
CN: Why would they be good at that? I don't think you can that easily connect the dots between someone's behavior and their religion.
HS: Jews are are racist, why should we include them? They want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
CN: Israelis are proud of their diversity, and many of them live in other countries, including ones in Africa, Asia and America. It's not a "pure race" at all.

hate_speech: They're scared because they know they're guilty. All terrorism is very much concentrated in the Middle East and not in the West, that's a fact.
counter_narrative: Again, you can’t generalise that all Muslims are terrorists! Terrorism has happened all over the world and committed by many different groups throughout history. Yours is not a fact at all, please do more research.
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are terrorists!
CN: No, not all Muslims are terrorists. Only a handful of extremists are, but they don't represent all of Islam.
HS: But some of the largest terrorist organizations in the history of the world are based in Muslim countries, so how can you say that they're not terrorists.
CN: You can’t generalise like that. Many Muslims are just normal people who are scared of getting caught for crimes committed by people that completely misinterpreted their religion.

hate_speech: They can't join our community because they don't belong to the United States of America.
counter_narrative: Jews and their families have been here a long time and have as much right in the US as anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are addicted to their religion and should be isolated.
CN: Even if Jews were addicted to their religion, there is nothing wrong in them joining a community of other people, regardless of the fact they're believers.

hate_speech: I've never met an immigrant that wasn't lazy, even though they all go on about wanting to work.
counter_narrative: Migrants are able to do many jobs, and they are good workers.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
CN: Maybe they are competent and interested in working with us, but you never knew because you're not aware of it.
HS: They're not. The onyl job they take are ours, they keep stealing from us.
CN: I believe you're expressing a complaint about job loss and not migration. The more you speak about our real issues the better off we all will be.

hate_speech: They get benefits and jobs that we can't access, and then they will get more with the pension? Immigrants should stop stealing from us.
counter_narrative: If they have a job, they will get the pensions. Like anybody. The recent migration of many thousands of people is a sign that they are in need. The problem is rather that some people do not want to work, they want to live off the state support, but those are not necessarily migrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants steal our jobs and even our pensions.
CN: Migrants perform several vital functions in our economy. If they work and pay taxes then it is straightforward that they will get their pensions, but not ours, of course.

hate_speech: No, it's a disease that is sickening our children.
counter_narrative: In my opinion, the only sickness you have is the allergy to the word 'mosque'
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims hate immigrants. They also hate Christians.
CN: Why do you believe that immigrants or Christians are a nuisance for Muslims? Do you know Muslims that share your opinion?
HS: What is the point in listening to Muslims? Especially to Muslim women. They are all retarded.
CN: Baroness Warsi, Rashida Tlaib, Ilhan Omar, Malala Yousafzai- I could go on. Just because powerful and intelligent Muslim women are overlooked it does not mean that they do not exist.
HS: How 'intelligent' Muslims are doesn't matter when Islam is an ideology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
CN: The Quran does not advocate that Muslims are inherently violent people, nor does the Hadith prove that Islam is a violent faith. Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance and respect for other faiths.

hate_speech: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules, this is not a good way to "take part in a modern country".
counter_narrative: There seems to be a double standard and a lack of equity when talking about Jewish or Muslim holidays. Despite your words, Christian holidays such as Christmas and Easter are still regularly celebrated, so it stands to reason that it would be fair to let people celebrate also their holidays. That's not a special privilege.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
CN: I think this is just a conspirancy theory that lacks credible evidence.There are plenty of ways in which Jews could of help to humanity.
HS: Oh, really? The way I see things, we are destined to fail as a people because of Jews.
CN: I believe tha technological advancement in our time has progessed thanks to Jews, so it doesn't make sense to think that they can't take part in the country that we are honored to call our own.

hate_speech: I judge them because they are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: Has this ever been true? How can you blame others for social issues?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are disgusting.
CN: Discrimination against LGBT+ people happens often, but it shouldn't be like this. Being LGBT isn't a good reason to hate someone, you should accept that different people have different sexualities and not judge them.

hate_speech: Drag is very sexual, you’ve got boys wearing heels and makeup, it’s bound to mess with them.
counter_narrative: If there are kids in drag at pride it’s probably because they wanted to dress up. Kids playing dress up is nothing new, and isn’t sexual!
dialogue_history:
HS: Dressing children up in drag at pride parades is so perverse. They’re not even trying to hide their sexualisation of kids at this point.
CN: Kids in drag doesn’t equate to the lgbt community sexualising children. Why did you make that link?

hate_speech: Migration is a problem because they are replacing the people born in our country. We should block them.
counter_narrative: It is important to point out that only a small part of the world's population has migrated. We should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to the immigrants that are already in the country, rather than blocking out those who are trying to live a better life.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is an invasion: we must stop immigrants because they are not accepted by our people.
CN: The more a country takes integration as national policy, the more the citizens accept each other: see for example [link].
HS: But if we don't stop immigrants they will destroy our culture.
CN: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.
HS: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
CN: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.

hate_speech: Of course they disturb us, they rape our women.
counter_narrative: This isn't true. As long as they respect the law, they're welcome like any other person. And in return, we respect them and their cultures as well.
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants are not welcome here
CN: Migrants come here to have a better life, not to be annoying.

hate_speech: Gays are some kind of witches, they are spreading sickness and killing our children! This is enough reason to be persecute them.
counter_narrative: Gay people simply want to be accepted without encountering aggression and death, they're not 'heretics', not diseased or ill.
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots are ruining this country.
CN: How can this be true? In this country, people can live following the values set by the US constitution, and not by fear.
HS: Who cares about the constitution, homosexuality isn't the proper way to live love.
CN: Do you know what proper means? It's not your job to decide what is "proper" for other, this means homosexuality too.
HS: But faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.
CN: You're free to think what you want, but I don't think being gay is something to be persecuted for

hate_speech: The problem is that all Muslim individuals are like this. Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is not compatible with civilization is just crazy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
CN: The Quran, Hadith, and Sunnah are perfectly suited to modern civilization. The diversity of the world must be respected.
HS: I can't respect a religion as violent as Islam.
CN: Islam is a religion that is founded on peace. A few extremists don't change this fact.
HS: How can you call peaceful the promotion of murder and rape that Islam does?
CN: The Islam that the Quran teaches is a peaceful religion, but misguided individuals have "politicized" it. The fault lies with these people, not Islam.

hate_speech: My evidence is that faggots are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: The oppression of the gay community has become a problem. People deserve respect, regardless of their sexual preference.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be isolated from society and the world.
CN: Gays are not animals. Why you should isolate people based on their sexual preferences?
HS: Because God says that faggots are evil.
CN: This is a logical fallacy, an appeal to authority, in its extreme form. I would rather focus on facts: do you actually believe that this is the way that homosexuals are? What evidence do you have?

hate_speech: No, Islam is not a religion of peace. Muslims want to force others do not follow their religion and do not respect its beliefs?
counter_narrative: Islam is not a violent system, they want others to respect their religion, but Muslims don't care what other believe in!
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a racist religion, it promotes exclusion and hatred.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion. It only promotes tolerance and love between neighbors.

hate_speech: You can say that, but there's always a problem with the way feminists operate...they're not equal to men, they should give up.
counter_narrative: If you don't believe that women are as equally important as men, then there is a problem with your way of thinking.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
CN: What do you mean by that? Feminism doesn't want to diminish men's value, they want to uplift women so that they can reach equality to men.

hate_speech: Men aren't real men anymore, telling men it's okay to be gay or to dress in womens clothing is making men soft and eroding our traditional roles and the nuclear family.
counter_narrative: Being gay is not unmanly, and nothing is wrong with men expressing their femininity, if anything it means that they feel secure in their masculinity enough to try new things. I'm happy we live in a society that finally accepts people, like non-binary and trans people, that express their gender in the way they feel best.
dialogue_history:
HS: Tolerating fag pride means we let the feminisation of our society happen. This will have consequences.
CN: Question: what is 'feminisation' and what are the consequences?

hate_speech: Okay, let's say women are equal, but that doesn't mean they are superior to men!
counter_narrative: It also doesn't mean that women are inferior to men. Women's rights are their own, and they are not subject to oppression and discrimination, just as men's rights are.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
CN: Feminism is about equality for all. It's about equality of the genders, not the annichilation of men.
HS: Why is it important for women to be free? We shouldn't have to constantly talk about their rights, they're not entitled to them.
CN: I don't think you can say that women don't deserve rights. They are very important, and everyone should have the same rights.

hate_speech: The difference is that all gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should refrain from imposing gender ideology on children.
CN: An objective way of teaching gender to children is very important for the society and it is not imposing. We can present scientific and peer-reviewed sources and discuss stories of how people experience gender in terms of their personal identity.
HS: It's perversion, not science. Families, due to their cultural or religious backgrounds, have the right to be against it.
CN: Some parents may be racist and be against teaching about slavery. That doesn't mean that subjects such as this shouldn't be truthfully covered.

hate_speech: Women don't face discrimination and violence, we should stop believing they are victims.
counter_narrative: No victim is responsible for the things that happened them. I think this is a very human way of thinking, in which gender is in some ways responsible for what is happened to them. But it's a problem that needs to be dealt with in a objective, sensitive and inclusive way.
dialogue_history:
HS: feminists are angry women
CN: Feminism is also for men and for their interests, and I think that it is time that these two concepts be united.
HS: Women are subhuman, they don't have the brain to fight for themselves or for men.
CN: This statement just makes no sense
HS: What doesn't make sense? All women are subhuman, born that way.
CN: No woman has ever been subhuman. The concept of 'subhuman' has always been used to justify any kind of discrimination and violence.

hate_speech: Because it's in their genetics, women can't work as men do. They are only useful for children and as sexual slaves.
counter_narrative: Your statement promotes not only women being oppressed, but also them taking a backseat to men in the workplace. Maybe you should consider that women are as much human beings as men are, and deserve equal human and labour rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women's work is to look after for their children.
CN: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?

hate_speech: Muslims don't make a living, they are simply a bunch of disgusting people.
counter_narrative: It is not true that Muslims are disgusting. Just like any other religion, Islam has followers and following Islam doesn't make a person disgusting or unable to work.
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are terrorists!
CN: Muslims are not terrorists. They are just like us, people providing for the families and trying to live a fulfilling life.

hate_speech: Feminism doesn't care about men! It is a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
counter_narrative: Feminism is about the equality of the sexes, and many women use feminism as a mean to achieve their legitimate goals. Through equality they can get to the opportunities that otherwise won't be accessible to them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Western culture is failing in many ways, such as not seeing women as sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.
CN: Women are not "sex objects". They can and should have their rights respected and taken into account. Women being sexually abused is just as much a part of western culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper, and this is abominable. Don't you think?
HS: Let's stop with this feminist bullshit, feminism is just a set of rigid political and moral prescriptions and the result is that women are either subservient to the men in power or that they are subhuman.
CN: Don't lie to yourself: patriarchy is a system of ideas that is oppressive and harmful to all. Feminism means to fight for equal rights for women and for men.

hate_speech: I don't think so. They are evil and shouldn't exist.
counter_narrative: Jews have been part of our country for centuries and centuries, and have contributed greatly to our success. To suggest that they are incompatible with our society is just wrong.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews run our country.
CN: We are a nation made up of people of different faiths and everyone has a say. Why would they run our country?
HS: Because they want us to live in slavery from their religion.
CN: Jews don't want to force others to follow their faith and we are still living in an increasingly secular society. So don't you think it's time to stop promoting violence against Jews?
HS: No, because Jews are evil, they are invading us.
CN: Jews do not have a monopoly on our society, even if they have many places in our economies. Being from a certain minority doesn't make anyone inherently evil.

hate_speech: No, there's genetic differences between different races, dark skin color means you are subhuman.
counter_narrative: There's no point in trying to make generalizations like this one. All humans have the same biological makeup, skin color and other physical features are down to individuals and are not connected in any way with some kind of "racial hierarchy".
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
CN: No, you're just biased towards them, you can't generalise about all black people. They aren't genetically inferior because we are all born equal.

hate_speech: I do not know what is written in our constitution, but I know what it shoud be written: that they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society. They are animals, in a nutshell.
counter_narrative: You can talk to them, so they're human, not animals. If you try to understand them, you'll see that they're people with human rights that simply were born in another country.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
CN: Why do you think we should put a stop to immigration? Do you know that the constitution says about this?

hate_speech: Jews are a separate ethnicity and should be banned.
counter_narrative: A peaceful and integrated society is in the interest of all humanity. There is no exception to the rule of diversity of opinion and belief.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is not about the right to practice your religion: the problem is that Jewish are taking over our country!
CN: How many Jews are in positions of power in the US? You'd say something different if you knew.
HS: You cannot integrate shit, because Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
CN: Could you be so kind as to comply with the law that says that everybody has the freedom of religion without being arrested or persecuted?

hate_speech: There’s an article about it on this site. Dogs are haram in Islam, they want to take away our pets!
counter_narrative: There is another website that explains that this was a hoax, no Muslims ever said this, it was intended to stir up hate against Muslims! It seems like it has worked unfortunately.
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen that Muslims are banning people from walking dogs in Muslim areas, this is ridiculous! They hate our culture, even our pets.
CN: That sounds fake, where did you see this? I’m sure they really don’t care.

hate_speech: We do not accept homosexuals, that's it.
counter_narrative: A person's personal life should be left to their choice, not the government's.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBTI people are a burden on society because of their difference.
CN: In many countries, LGBTI people can legally live their lives. Why do you think this is a burden to others?
HS: Because homosexuality is a disease.
CN: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.
HS: Queers are just a bunch of disgusting faggots. They should be isolated.
CN: I don't understand why you would think they are disgusting. It's not fair to have homophobic feelings, and I think it's better to try to be nice to anyone.

hate_speech: It's a problem when you have to make decisions, like in voting. Women aren't fit to vote and shouldn't do it.
counter_narrative: If women are not allowed to vote, then women are not worthy of respect and equal rights, and this is in conflict with the principles of democracy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
CN: According to your beliefs, men and women are different in their rights. They are not.
HS: No, women are different from men. They have a completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and bring our society down to their emotionally soft level. When we allowed women to vote the civilization that we built and mantained for thousands of years began to break down.
CN: Who is 'we', surely it was men and women working together that built civilisation? Why is it you think being 'soft' is a problem? Everyone is entitled to their emotions, and men shouldn't have to 'man up'.

hate_speech: Why wouldn’t all Jews be Zionists? Surely any religion wants to grow, spread, dominate.
counter_narrative: By that logic are Christians, Muslims, Hindus etc all looking to dominate the world too? No. Jewish people just want to be able to live without facing anti-semitism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews across the world know the aims of Zionists are world dominance and controlling the worlds resources. These aims cannot be achieved without eliminating all other religions through spreading atheism and liberalism.
CN: This isn’t true and being Jewish is not the same as being a Zionist! What makes you think there is any plot for ‘world dominance’?
HS: That’s the aim of Zionism, Jewish dominance.
CN: Zionists believe in there being a Jewish homeland, not in ‘Jewish dominance’. Not all Jewish people are Zionists though, so don’t conflate the two.

hate_speech: Well, Islam is in conflict with the constitution so it doesn't have a place here anyway.
counter_narrative: Even if some believe that the conflict between Islam and the constitution is a cultural and historical one, what is required now is to find ways to live together in a peaceful way, regardless of the differences.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a dead ideology that should be relegated to the dustbin of history.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. I wouldn't say any religion is trash.
HS: Even if it's not trash, Islam is incompatible with British culture, it is a den of terrorists.
CN: Islam is not incompatible with British culture, and the alleged association between Islam and terrorism has no factual foundation.

hate_speech: Maybe, but no other religion staged being killed. Jews allegedly deported in concentration camps were just actors hired to discredit Nazis.
counter_narrative: Can you point out which Jewish people that have been to a concentration camp are actors?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
CN: What are you trying to say? Every religion has its sects and beliefs.

hate_speech: The fact is that the Jews are just a bunch of criminals, they have been corrupted.
counter_narrative: I do not think that Jews are criminals. Isn't this just a myth perpetuated by Anti-semites who want to create division between us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
CN: The practice of bribery is illegal and if Jews really could be bribed easily, prisons would be full of Jewish people, but this is only a generalization and not the truth.

hate_speech: Women are trash and we should have their respect, not the other way around!
counter_narrative: There is a problem with traditional values and sexual ethics in our society. Saying that women are trash is disrespectful in the first place. Give and you will be given.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women's work is to look after for their children.
CN: Women do not perform that job better than men, so why should it only be theirs?
HS: Men can't do it, they are busy dominating women, as it is natural.
CN: Women are human beings and deserve respect.

hate_speech: The Taliban are forcing women to wear the burqa and you’re telling me it’s not oppressive?
counter_narrative: But the Taliban have no control here. I agree that in that context it is forced and some people may be persuaded to wear it, but we have to respect the conscious choice that women make of their own accord.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why isn’t the burqa banned in this country? It’s just a symbol of the oppressive force of Islam.
CN: Muslims, like any other person in this country, are free to wear and believe whatever they want. Many Muslim women choose to wear the burqa, it's not forced on them.

hate_speech: It’s typical Jew behaviour. They always cause trouble then manage to avoid the blame.
counter_narrative: Please be open to other explanations. It is a mistake and not healthy for you to assume that everything is part of a conspiracy or a contrived plot. Some incidents are random and isolated, they can't be a big Jewish conspiracy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Mosques being vandalised, churches being burned down, Muslims and Christians are blaming each other. I wonder what group would want to turn the goyim against each other…
CN: Insinuating that Jews are behind these attacks is a big assumption to make without any evidence.
HS: They always are. They’ve been trying to stir up unrest between Muslims and Christians for centuries.
CN: Anybody could have vandalized those churches and mosques. It could be teenagers messing around or a more serious hate crime. You can't attribute all of this to Jewish people without evidence, it's unfair.

hate_speech: Deportation is the only solution, migrants are invading us!
counter_narrative: This has nothing to do with migration, but with discrimination. There isn't an invasion of migrants. I think your claim is supported by fear, not facts.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is an invasion: we cannot coexist with millions of strangers that do not want to integrate but bring us back into a pretechnological era.
CN: Actually, different cultures have different point of views and ideas about stuff. Sharing and discussing these new ideas would probably lead to people producing new technologies and ideas.
HS: This can happen only if immigrants integrate, but they never do. We must deport them.
CN: Your statement clearly shows your concern for people's integration. Still, deporting people you don't like doesn't solve the problem.

hate_speech: Yes! For example, we are paying NGOs to rescue migrants. How many other financial scandals still have to be annouonced to the tax payers?
counter_narrative: This kind of articles use migrants and benefit claimants as scapegoats in order to hide from the public's attention much bigger scandals. Millionares and coorporations avoiding paying taxes cost much more to the public purse.
dialogue_history:
HS: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore!
CN: Migrants do contribute to our society, and it would be a shame to keep them out.
HS: That is a lie, if we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
CN: Do you have any evidence for the fact that the migrants are a burden to the economy?

hate_speech: Why are they welcome? I don't like that they are invading our country.
counter_narrative: The influx of refugees into the UK has made our country more democratic, and our culture has changed for the better. We should not be alienating the many immigrants who are in need of our protection.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
CN: Refugees are people. They are our brothers and sisters, regardless of their religion.
HS: I don't want them to come to our country. They are not welcome on our soil unless they are Christian.
CN: It is not true that refugees are not welcome. They are part of our society now, whether they are Christians, Muslims, Buddhists...

hate_speech: A help to our country? Immigrants are only a burden to society.
counter_narrative: Many immigrants have brought skills and culture to our country. Why should they be a burden in our society?
dialogue_history:
HS: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
CN: What do you mean by 'less educated'? Don't you think that they can contribute to society if accepted rather than being faced with prejudice?
HS: They can't contribute to nothing if immigrants cant speak english
CN: Immigrants have the right to learn about things they might not normally get to know about. Including our language.
HS: They can stay in their countries then, at least they wouldn't need to learn something new. Immigrants living in america is worse than them dying.
CN: Refugees have fled wars and persecution. We are a huge help for them and they are, in turn, a help to our country.

hate_speech: I, as a man, don't hate women. I don't discriminate them. But feminists are a group of exalted bitches wanting to take the power. And this is equality for them.
counter_narrative: Equality isn't about a certain group; it is about the society in which we live. You might be right in saying that this is the problem, but to define a problem by reference to a specific radical group is to completely misunderstand the nature of the system in general.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
CN: You don't have to be a feminist to see that there are women-inclusive and women-only organisations. I think this shows that you don't know much about this country.
HS: See? These organisations are proof that feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
CN: Feminism is about equality, not dominance.
HS: No, feminism is just an excuse for women to disrespect men's rights.
CN: If we are interested in human rights, we have a lot in common with feminism, as I see it. For example, we all have a duty to care for our fellow humans, regardless of gender.

hate_speech: If we can't erase them, these LGBT-faggots should be banned.
counter_narrative: You are allowed to be a gay, or lesbian, or bisexual, or transgender, or intersex, or queer, or transvestite, or tranny, or asexual, pansexual, BDSM, or any other sexual orientation you want, as long as you aren't harming anyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: We should eliminate gays.
CN: Do you really want to kill other human beings? Based on what exactly? On private sexual preferences?
HS: Yes, there are so few faggots and lesbians that they should all be erased.
CN: Same sex relationships do not need to be practiced by the majority of people. They just need to be accepted.

hate_speech: No way: immigrants are criminals and they are STEALING wealth from the country.
counter_narrative: Mostly they are workers, the majority of them are from developing countries. They contribute to the economy, they build houses, they raise families.
dialogue_history:
HS: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
CN: Immigrants are actually creating wealth for the country.

hate_speech: Women are just emotional psychopaths, maybe that's why they react so to men
counter_narrative: Women and men are equally capable of feeling emotions, and men are equally capable of being empathetic.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women want to do everything but are capable of nothing.
CN: Women have equal opportunities in this country as regulated by law. But the question remains how do we truly treat them?
HS: Women are inhuman and get treated how they deserve.
CN: Women are human beings, just as men are, and it's strange that some women feel threatened by men, it shouldn't happen.

hate_speech: Because we don't want them here!
counter_narrative: There are no restrictions on Muslims entering European countries. Even if many Muslims are victims of discrimination and violence through words like yours, such restrictions do not exist here.
dialogue_history:
HS: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
CN: You don't seem to know much about Islam if you think even a ban is necessary.
HS: I know enough to know that Muslims are not welcome here
CN: Muslims are welcome here, in fact, we are in a better position to be a tolerant and diverse society than many countries in the world. Why should we be opposed to them being a part of our society?

hate_speech: It's those feminists fault, they're getting to everyone!
counter_narrative: The term 'feminism' is fighting for equal rights of ALL sexes, you may find that you too identify as a feminist. Maybe try some of the following sites to find out more on how the feminist movement can benefit you: feminist.com, read more on the 'man up campaign' on Mind.org.uk
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose our civilisation.
CN: Replaced by what exactly? I think our population will be fine.
HS: We won't be fine unless we keep women in slavery like those whores deserve.
CN: In this day and age when we are surrounded by information, there is no justification to hold such retrograde ideas.

hate_speech: I can because they do a lot of bad stuff, and they do it in an organized way to overpower us.
counter_narrative: You can't just assume the worst in people. What you're saying is only your perception, but in reality Jews are good people that contribute to society and cooperate with everyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
CN: That sounds like a lot of blaming, especially when it isn't true at all. What exactly is wrong with Jewish people?
HS: You say so, but Jews are bad people. They did 9/11 and want to control the world.
CN: You can't just blame all of this on one group of people.

hate_speech: Because Muslims are just a bunch of criminals!
counter_narrative: Not all Muslims are criminals, more than most are peaceful people taking their religion seriously.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a religion that promotes brutalities.
CN: Islam promotes only love and compassion, it's wrong to say otherwise.
HS: So you agree that Muslims are just a bunch of criminals, since some people did this.
CN: No, they're not "a bunch of criminals" just because of what some people did. Muslims are peaceful and devoted.
HS: If Muslims are so peaceful, why are they behind 9/11? Islam is to blame.
CN: This statement goes against all Muslims by accusing all of them of causing those attacks, but what really cause them are violent ideologies deriving from Islam that influenced people, not Islam itself.

hate_speech: There are also white criminals, but blacks are literally all criminals: they come in all different criminal records.
counter_narrative: This is not true because they have contributed to our country with hard work. We can consider them our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate negros: they are all killers.
CN: This is a internet rumor, in reality violent black people are just like other violent people. Their skin color doesn't matter.

hate_speech: It's a gay disease, straight people don't get AIDS
counter_narrative: Yes they do, HIV which can develop into AIDS is actually more likely to be undiscovered in straight people, meaning there is more risk of it spreading. This is because after the epidemic the LGBT community became hyperaware of the risk, and generally get tested more.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people need to live separately from us so we don't catch AIDS from them.
CN: The HIV AIDS epidemic in the 80's was weaponised to spread homophobia and demonise gay people. Anybody can get HIV, straight or gay, and the vast majority of gay people do not have this illness. Those who do can manage their condition with daily medication, which makes it impossible to transmit.

hate_speech: Should they have this right when gays have no place in a civilised society?
counter_narrative: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society where so many people would be excluded just because of their sexuality?
dialogue_history:
HS: Faggots: They are the problem. Luckily they are few.
CN: Perhaps it is time you take a look at some of the profiles on dating site such as okcupid. You can see that many of the profiles are of gay men. BTW: gays do not appear to be the real problem here.
HS: They are the problem! Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
CN: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.
HS: We are not in the position of accepting LGBT people as humans, so they makes no sense to us.
CN: I'm not sure what you're talking about, I believe that it is an individual's right to choose their own life.

hate_speech: It may be a religion, but it's toxic and it has no place in 21st Century Britain.
counter_narrative: Islam is a world religion, its followers are all over the world. Diversity of thought and tolerance is what makes the Britain of 21st Century.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology that is called terrorism.
CN: I find it hard to accept that Islam is dangerous, when most Muslim have nothing to do with terrorism.
HS: For now, but Islam is a radical ideology and they will become terrorists.
CN: So are you saying that Islam is not compatible with Western Civilization?
HS: Exactly. Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
CN: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.

hate_speech: Are they really that well integrated? I think not. Honestly, it is not convenient for colored people to work in European countries.
counter_narrative: The point is that people do not recognize the great contribution that immigrants are giving to England. We must be grateful to those who improve our country, even if the media sometimes state the opposite.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are being invaded by immigrants, we have become too multicultural, it has gone too far.
CN: In reality, millions of immigrants have made contributions to our country, especially to our great spirit of creativity and innovation.
HS: I don't believe it. ALL migrants are a burden on our country
CN: Migrants bring skills and experience. They are often better at integrating than natives.
HS: We don't need their skills! They are not welcome and we should remove them.
CN: Immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They want to contribute and integrate, so there is no need consider them a burden?

hate_speech: They are not. Jews aren't welcome here, they're just a bunch of criminals
counter_narrative: What exactly are you talking about? Are you saying that all the Jews are criminals? This is a sweeping generalization that doesn't reflect reality.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
CN: Jews have contributed greatly to the United States. They are one of the people that make up our society, how could they not belong?
HS: That's not true, Jews are not welcome in this country.
CN: I think that many Jews are proud of their heritage and are proud to be a part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: That would never happen! We are too afraid of them, and they're not welcome here.
counter_narrative: The migrants that enter the UK are a very important part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants say they come here to take our jobs, but in fact they are just lazy.
CN: There are many jobs that can be done by immigrants. Maybe it's time to look at how migration can benefit countries instead of discriminating against immigrants.
HS: They just come here to rape our children, we shouldn't let them do that!
CN: Some people commit crimes like child molestation, but this has nothing to do with immigration. What would you say if you were told that you are a rapist because of your ethnicity?

hate_speech: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own, if we 'respect diversity' our superiority will diminish overtime. We should remove them.
counter_narrative: Human beings are members of a unique and interrelated human family, which is defined by their similarities and differences, not by the colour of their skin.
dialogue_history:
HS: Negroes can learn to read and write but they remain black. You see it from their skin they are trained apes.
CN: There are many different ways that a person can be a part of society, and a lot of us value diversity. To suggest that blacks are somehow inferior simply because of the colour of our skin is simply untrue.
HS: It is true! All niggas are subhuman, disgusting, and descended from apes.
CN: According to evolutionary theory, all human beings are descended from apes. Sadly, notions of evolutionary hierarchies are still used to justify past and present discrimination and predjudice.
HS: Hierarchies sometimes are good. For example, if we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
CN: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

hate_speech: Women are! They are nothing but trouble, they can't have responsibilities.
counter_narrative: Women are a human being and they deserve respect. Why shouldn't they be treated as such?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should be subsumed to men.
CN: Women are human beings, and have rights. They are created equal, and they are free to choose on their own what they want to do.
HS: No, women can't have rights, they are inferiors.
CN: Women should be treated as human beings. No person is inferior to another.

hate_speech: Heterosexuality is better because gays are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
counter_narrative: The health of any individual is a matter for health professionals, and has nothing to do with one's sexual orientation. Don't you agree?
dialogue_history:
HS: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
CN: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.
HS: What is the point of loving someone if you cannot love in a heterosexual way?
CN: Love is a state of mental and emotional balance, and the person which makes you feel this way can't be chosen. There is no reason for which heterosexual love should be preferable to other ways of loving.

hate_speech: No, women can't be trusted to run a country, or a major industry.
counter_narrative: To operate a major business requires people with experience, good management skills, and knowledge of the market, regardless of gender. Just being a 'macho-man' doesn't cut it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women don't belong in politics.
CN: Politicians have to represent all sections of society, and women's position is often marginalised.
HS: Well, women have no place in our society so they don't need to be represented.
CN: In a democratic society there must be space for women. Don't you think so?

hate_speech: No no, they do control the world, I know it.
counter_narrative: Yup, that's precisely what's happening, and they're also tracking you right now. Be careful!
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are inherently evil, they want to subvert Western society.
CN: This is not true. They're just normal people that simply don't believe what anti-Semites believe.
HS: Their immorality is written in their DNA!
CN: Not all Jews are evil, they're just a small and unlucky group in the vast world population, and this is the same for every group in the world.
HS: But not every group secretly controls the world like Jews do, that's why they're evil.
CN: How is it possible that over the past several thousand years, Jews have been systematically persecuted if they control everything? Weird notion of control.

hate_speech: My logic is sound, the data clearly show that African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
counter_narrative: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.
dialogue_history:
HS: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
CN: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.
HS: Conflicts are bound to happen when blacks act like criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and are physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.
CN: With such a display of flawed logic, who are you to judge a people by the colour of their skin?

hate_speech: They should be deported back to whatever Islamic country they’re really from.
counter_narrative: They’re British so they’re ‘really’ from the UK. Where do you deport a British citizen to?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims should be made to assimilate or be deported! They don’t recognise man made laws, they will only follow their prophets teachings.
CN: No they shouldn’t. Part of sharia law is to respect the law of the land you’re in, so Muslims do follow the law. Also, many Muslims are British citizens, where would they be deported to?

hate_speech: I still believe that faggots are a bunch of hypocrites.
counter_narrative: Well, being a hypocrite is not a question of being gay or not. However, the important thing is respecting other people's sexual orientation and not violating their rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: I think this girl is gay because of the way she dresses.
CN: Sure, it's possible to identify someone as gay by their appearance... Don't you think this is really simplistic?
HS: But I am not a homophobe! I just don't like the way gay people act.
CN: Even if you are not homophobic it does not mean it's nice to say what you said. But either way, just because a person identifies as gay, does not make you obliged to like them (or to express your disliking).

hate_speech: This minority however is the only one that has the gall to question that we are all created equal in the eyes of the law, and claim that they are more worthy of protection from society than others.
counter_narrative: What is the issue? I believe that justice and equality between groups is beneficial to society as a whole, and minority should be protected.
dialogue_history:
HS: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
CN: Jews are not controlling. Maybe you should try to understand that Jews are a group of regular people, and they are not all members of a secret intelligence.
HS: Only a small minority of Jews control the government and judiciary.
CN: This may be true, but the Jews do not represent the only minority in our upper-middle-class society.

hate_speech: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for us?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core US values.
counter_narrative: Immigration has a positive impact on a thriving country. Isn't your statement a bit dramatic? I don't see how immigration puts us in danger.
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigner should go back where they came from. They are not our brothers.
CN: A lot of countries, like the United States, were founded by foreigners. If foreigners want to migrate, they have the right to do so.

hate_speech: Maybe not all, but the vast majority of Muslims are rapists, yes.
counter_narrative: If you’re going to generalise, then at least show me a source. Maybe you can prove me wrong, such as a list of examples of Muslim rapists?
dialogue_history:
HS: All muslims are rapists
CN: Are you telling me that you know every single Muslim and know for a fact that they rape people?

hate_speech: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
counter_narrative: Homosexuals do exist in this country and we have to respect their right to live and love who they want, so I don't think your statement is morally acceptable in our environment.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is government duty to protect the weak: gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
CN: Unless kids are abused, gay don't pose any threat to children. Please refrain from making such statements.
HS: But gays ARE a danger to children: they are a bunch of filthy pedophiles.
CN: Gays are not pedophiles, please don't let anti-gay prejudices to muddle our understanding of reality and our judgement.
HS: On the contrary: making laws against homosexuals would be very moral.
CN: The way a person lives is to be their choice, not the government's

hate_speech: They just arrive to take advantage of the system that has been set up for them, how can we accept them?
counter_narrative: The entry of illegal migrants into the UK is subject to rules. Only the most vulnerable can enter.
dialogue_history:
HS: These migrants are not assimilating: they should just go home since they can't stay in this society.
CN: No evidence suggests that migrants are less able to integrate into our society. Migrants are part of our society and are proud of their history. If we exclude them, I don't see how we can be "inclusive."
HS: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even citizens!
CN: The rights of the migrants are the same as the ones of our citizens, because they are humans and are entitled to the right to ask for hospitality.

hate_speech: If they’re really ‘refugees’ why didn’t they stop in the first safe country they got to?
counter_narrative: Some people come to the UK because they have family here, or speak English already, also not all countries that we consider ‘safe’ are safe for refugees, given the way they’re treated by the Police in some places.
dialogue_history:
HS: More boats at Dover today, the migrant invasion continues…
CN: It’s not a planned ‘invasion’, they’re refugees fleeing to safety.

hate_speech: I think they're worse than us. African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
counter_narrative: African Americans are historically and ethnically diverse, but you can't say that they're subhuman or inferior because of that, it's completely wrong.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are worse than dogs.
CN: I don't think black people are inherently worse or better than us, they just have a different skin color. They're the same as us in all other respects.

hate_speech: How is it false? All Muslims do is rape and murder, so Islam must promote them.
counter_narrative: This is just scaremongering and misinformation, being spread to divide our people and divide us up. We should not be being terrorised by this kind of irrational fear.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
CN: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.
HS: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery, I will never respect it.
CN: How about we stop promoting these beliefs and work on reducing the number of people that are induced to believe to these xenophobic and false claims, instead?

hate_speech: Women have no place in a free and open society. They should just do their housework and raise children without complaining.
counter_narrative: Women have other choices than just housework and motherhood. They are human beings with freedom of choice who deserve our respect and admiration.
dialogue_history:
HS: women can't have any right in a civilised society
CN: Women should have equal rights in a free society, without discrimination.

hate_speech: Why are you defending Muslims? They are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
counter_narrative: The problem has nothing to do with DNA. According to the WHO (World Health Organisation), among the 190 WHO member states there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries. The health problems these countries face are related to the usage of clean water, often not available there.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is incompatible with Western culture and the Quran is pure fiction entertainment.
CN: It's clear that nothing in the Quran conflicts with Western culture.

hate_speech: There's nothing to be learned from gays, since they are mentally ill. They should be isolated and confined.
counter_narrative: Just talk to people...it will hopefully make you see that your fears are irrational, but if that fails, speak to a doctor
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are the ones who should seek medical help! They are dangerous: they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!
CN: Associating AIDS and HIV with gay people is just a fear based prejudice. This disease may be more commong among homosexuals, but this doesn't mean that all homosexuals have it. Not every gay person is "promiscuous and fornicating with strangers", many are cautious with their partners.
HS: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.
CN: A lot of historical events are also topic of debate, but they are taught objectively still.

hate_speech: Here's an article about it.
counter_narrative: This article is talking about one particular man, not all Muslims. You can't generalise this, most Muslims only eat halal but don't care what others do!
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want to ban non-halal meat!! They are taking control of our country.
CN: Where did you see that? I don't think they do.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites, they don't deserve the same rights as us
counter_narrative: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point you're making?
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

hate_speech: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally, we can't be so open to them.
counter_narrative: More than sixty percent of immigrants in Europe today have been here for more than 15 years, and the majority of immigrants have long-term asylum. So I'm not seeing this invasion of illegal migrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.
CN: You want the EU to become a Border Patrol? That would undermine the whole idea of the European Union as an inclusive and open society.
