hate_speech: But the news show that migrants rape our women!
counter_narrative: This phenomenon is very complex and the statistics have to be analyzed carefully: most rape incidents actually happen in the home and are not reported.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are the same people that came here to rape our children.
CN: Rape is always bad, regardless of the perpetrator. It's important to focus on preventing such abuse.
HS: And we can do that by stopping immigrants, they're the ones that rape our woment the most.
CN: This is a very misleading generalization.

hate_speech: I'm don't care about inclusion, Africans are a problem.
counter_narrative: The real problem is that a lot of people from different backgrounds are discriminated against. That's why we need to focus on helping each other instead.
dialogue_history:
HS: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
CN: This is a very misleading concept used to describe people who are discriminated against, particularly Africans. They are all people who have been affected by racism. They deserve to be valued and respected, and we are so proud of having them in our country.
HS: We're not proud of them! This is racism against whites!
CN: This is not about racism. It is about diversity. We are a country founded on respect and equity and this means that black people also needs to be respected.

hate_speech: If they want to come here they should know English, but they don't
counter_narrative: Some of them don't know a lot about our culture, but others speak English very well.
dialogue_history:
HS: immigrants cant speak English
CN: Immigrants are entitled to learn what they usually don't get to know, and this includes our language.

hate_speech: Where are they all coming from then?!
counter_narrative: It's a matter of fact that since the beginning of the decade most terrorists in the US have been US citizens. I think that maybe we should look into the homeland situation instead of the one in Mexico.
dialogue_history:
HS: Mexican terrorists are still a problem that we should address. It's time to close the border!
CN: The Mexican border has never been a legitimate entry way for terrorists, this idea is not supported by any credible intelligence or evidence on the ground and so is the suggestion that individuals that have ties to ISIL have been apprehended at the southwest border. Moreover, there's no known international terrorist organization operating in Mexico, no evidence that any terrorist group has targeted US citizens in Mexico, and no credible evidence that any terrorist has tried to enter the US through Mexico. As I said, most terrorist attacks since 2002 are commited by US citizens.
HS: Terrorists are infiltrating the U.S. across the border with Mexico.
CN: Mexican borders are not a safe haven for terrorist entry, there isn't any proof.

hate_speech: Everyone knows that terrorism is a Muslim problem, you don't see white guys suicide bombing places.
counter_narrative: Aren't the mass shootings that happen all the time in the US also terrorist acts? And each one was done by lone white males. Shooting a bunch of people at random sounds like a terrorist attack to me, but you seem to understand terrorism as something exclusively Muslim, which isn't true.
dialogue_history:
HS: All of these white men committing mass killings and molesting children disgust me. They're totally appropriating Muslim culture!
CN: What's with you turning crimes committed by white nonmuslim men into something Islamophobic?
HS: It's true though, makes a change to see a white murderers with all the violent Jihadis that are usually committing these acts.
CN: I think that it has more to do with your viewing habits. Some media report only crimes commited by Muslims, so if you watch only them, you won't realize that Muslims perpetrators are only a minority compared to white non-Muslim ones.

hate_speech: No, black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
counter_narrative: And racism would be much healthier? It doesn't belong to the 21st century and children especially shouldn't learn discrimination and hate.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is ok to be racist against blacks.
CN: Racism isn't okay against anyone. If someone treated you as you want to treat black people, you would feel bad.
HS: In fact black people are the real racists. They say they want equality, but they actually want to give preference to black people, that's why I give it right back to them.
CN: I think that the issue here is equality. Equality between people is a right that needs to be respected, and it should granted to everyone.

hate_speech: Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: Muslims make up around 5% of the population in Europe, which is more than three times less than they were in 1100. They have contributed greatly to our civilisation. Their diversity is part of what makes Europe so great as well.
HS: We don't need them here, they will corrupt our civilisation, not make it great.
CN: This is a generalisation, there is no difference between Islam and any other religion in terms of so-called 'civilisation'.

hate_speech: They're going to bring more crime with them, and they're just changing things. You walk down the street now and people are speaking every language except english.
counter_narrative: I understand your concern but I think if you tried to get to know them you wouldn't see migrants as a threat anymore. Maybe they have a different culture or language but it's not scary, simply unfamiliar, so don't feel unsafe!
dialogue_history:
HS: No police on the beat anymore and more and more migrants moving into my local area, it doesn't feel safe here anymore! This country is changing beyond recognition.
CN: So sorry to hear that you don't feel safe in your local area anymore, but are you sure migrants moving there has something to do with it?

hate_speech: You're right, anywhere where there's a shortage of doctors, nurses, or specialists there could be infected people. And since in poor countries there aren't many professionals, it's immigrants that are infected and come here to spread it!
counter_narrative: Even if that were the case, you know that we can cure it by treating patients with antibiotics, right? You can't have your mind made up on how people can have tuberculosis without actually knowing anything about the statistics on the disease and its diffusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
CN: I wouldn't say it's a coincidence, it seems there is an increased incidence of it in all social and economic classes across Europe. Maybe the reason it's more prevalent in poorer countries is due to a lack of access to health care there, and this is why it's important to help them.

hate_speech: Immigrants are just a burden to society, in spite of their hard work.
counter_narrative: They are our brothers and sisters. We need to help them settle and respect them, since they are fleeing from plights like poverty and war.
dialogue_history:
HS: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
CN: Immigrants contribute to our country and to our economy. We need to be more active in welcoming people to our country, for example we shouldn't lie about the level of education of immigrants.
HS: Why should we welcome ignorant and dangerous people like immigrants to our country?
CN: Immigrants often work hard and help building bridges between different cultures. This is what is needed in a democracy.

hate_speech: But it can't be disproven that the Jews at least have a plot to take over the world, starting from the US government that they control
counter_narrative: The reality is much simpler. In the United States, right and freedom are extended to the whole population, and Jewish people have managed to succeed, and this is the case of any other religious or ethnic group.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
CN: Even if the Jews controlled the financial word, Hollywood, academia, and the whole universe, it doesn't mean that they are evil, privileged or greedy. Where's the proof for what you say?
HS: If they weren't evil, they wouldn't control the government
CN: Would you say the same for another religion? If this was said about yours, how would you feel about it?
HS: You're trying to turn this on me but you're not denying that Jews control the world
CN: The Jews have nothing to do with this alleged monopoly on the world. It's an idea spread around by anti-Semites that has been disproven time and time again.

hate_speech: Brothers and sisters? You mean violent terrorists.
counter_narrative: Muslims aren't terrorists, most of them are here to work and help their families.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are surrounded by Muslims and they are all the same. They are all terrorists.
CN: And what about the thousands of Muslims that have been contributors to our country by creating jobs and providing for our families?
HS: I don't care how much they contribute, Muslims are not welcome in our country.
CN: You know Muslims make up a very important part of our country and they are our brothers and sisters

hate_speech: But we aren't comfortable with different cultures displayed like this, we like in America so they need to behave that way, or people will likely have issues with it.
counter_narrative: You have to be in a more open society to understand the problems faced by many people in the developing world. This learning opportunity is good for all citizens, diversity is a benefit to us.
dialogue_history:
HS: A nice quote that comes to mind is that of Theodore Roosevelt.. in which he explains that to be comfortable in a country where you migrate you have to integrate into the social fabric.

CN: This is true and in fact migrants that come to the United States are very good at integrating. This doesn't mean that they have to lose their tradition and culture, though.

hate_speech: I'm tired of hearing about Nazism when Jews are just as bad. They should be thrown out for good.
counter_narrative: We should focus on keeping in mind the fact that the Nazis were responsible for the death of 6 million people. What have Jews done except being victims of this?
dialogue_history:
HS: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
CN: Nazism was terrible, it did nothing to make the world better. It's very sad that despite how many people have died because of it, there are still people that think it wasn't that bad.

hate_speech: I don't feel equal with black people, they are all rapists while whites aren't.
counter_narrative: This is not true. Abuse is a serious crime regardless of who commits it, it doesnt' become less serious when a white person does it.
dialogue_history:
HS: Whites are inherently superior to Africans and other people of color.
CN: The opposite is true: natural superiority doesn't exist, it's a myth created to justify racism and exclusion. We are all born equal in the eyes of the law and God.

hate_speech: But homosexuality IS a disease!
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men being shot is funny.
CN: I don't see the humour in the death of innocent people. Maybe you can explain that to me?
HS: Gay men get all sort of diseases. They are dangerous.
CN: Diseases can be found in all people, regardless of sexual orientation. You should know better before randomly deducing someone's medical history.

hate_speech: That's not right, women are animals and should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
counter_narrative: Women are human and have choices. You can have whatever opinion you want, but claiming that women have to be submissive holds them back. It's a waste of talent and potential.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women shouldn't have the right to choose what to do with their body.
CN: The human right to body autonomy is important and should be respected. Let's stop with the "boys will be boys" stereotype.
HS: What I want is for women to remain at home with the children, that's what they are supposed to do.
CN: Fortunately enough, most women have careers, be they married or unmarried. Housework is evenly split between them and their husbands, because this is what it's supposed to be like.

hate_speech: Jews are selfish, greedy, and don't try to live a fulfilling life, it's a shame because they would have the right to be treated as equals otherwise.
counter_narrative: I think it's a shame that Jewish people are considered to be an inferior race when they are humans just like us. What you say is completely false, Jews are capable citizens.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without Jews.
CN: Jews are a part of our society, and they contribute to our economy. How is it possible to see the world without them?
HS: They're not, they should go back to their cult of personality.
CN: Jews don't have a cult of personality, they simply live in a different way from other people. Many of them are good people. This is why we should strive to be kind to them.

hate_speech: It's a preference that isn't compatible with our society, gays should be isolated and isolated soon.
counter_narrative: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
CN: We shouldn't judge someone by their sexual preference, that is a personal preference and can't be changed.

hate_speech: Islam is a cancer on European culture and people should stop worshipping its devil.
counter_narrative: There is no evidence for the claim that Islam is a "cancer on European culture and people". Do you have any?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: Muslims are part of Europe, since the beginning. For example, in the 1970s they made up the 2% of the French population.
HS: We should get rid of all of them, Muslims can't stay here.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace, and its adherents are already integrated into the majority of European societies.

hate_speech: No, it is not about fear. They REALLY are just a bunch of criminal monkeys.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, but just because someone doesn't have a particular racial identity doesn't make them inherently bad or in any way inferior.
dialogue_history:
HS: Afro-Caribbean's are just a bunch of stupid and dangerous dancing n*ggers, they should be banned.
CN: There are still incidents of hate speech being hurled at people from different ethnic backgrounds, and it is because of the fear of different ways of life.

hate_speech: Gays are a problem in our society, that's my feeling.
counter_narrative: Even though people are born equal in the eyes of God, it seems that some are born in the eyes of hate. We cannot allow those who don't want to change to ruin our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
CN: Apparently your words condemn all gay people, but these words are simply your personal opinion. What are your feelings about gay people?

hate_speech: What is wrong with women being cheated on for their sexual value?
counter_narrative: Because women are human beings, they have the right to live their lives as they wish, and they have the right to not be used for sexual reasons. Cheating is morally wrong, isn't it?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just a burden to society.
CN: Women are human beings with a full human value. To suggest otherwise is just wrong.

hate_speech: They're gay, of course I can't accept them, they're disgusting and should be banned.
counter_narrative: No one should be allowed to have this kind of power over a portion of the population. Even though you don't like gays, they have every right to remain here because they are people like everyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
CN: The issue of gay people is not their sexuality, but the fact that they're not accepted in society as they should.

hate_speech: I think they are just a bunch of parasites, that's why they shouldn't vote.
counter_narrative: Black people are human beings, not parasites. There's no scientific evidence for what you say, we are all human.
dialogue_history:
HS: No nigga should have the right to vote.
CN: The constitution guarantees that every person has the right to vote, including black people. Denying this right would be wrong.

hate_speech: I don't see any peacefulness in Islam, all I see is violence.
counter_narrative: Violence is not tied to any religion, it can be found in extremist actions instead. Don't you agree?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is not about faith, it is about enmity and war.
CN: Why did you pick Islam as the religion to be angry about? It doesn't look like you have good reasons for it.
HS: Islam is the only religion that is founded on hate and violence, though.
CN: I don't see all this hatred. Islam teaches peace and harmony, which aren't attitudes but something that must be actively practiced. Islam teaches that all people are created equal. Isn't this peaceful enough?
HS: Islam is a violent religion, that's why.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion, not all Muslims are violent.

hate_speech: Still, we should remove them.
counter_narrative: To label a person by their biological makeup is not conducive to the respect of a person's humanity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
CN: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.

hate_speech: I don't like niggas, they are just a bunch of criminals and thieves.
counter_narrative: Maybe you should check your own feelings. Moreover, if you are concerned about our country's security, you should carefully check crime statistics first.
dialogue_history:
HS: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
CN: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

hate_speech: Then why do they have so much money?
counter_narrative: What about other groups of people in our society that make too much money and are not Jewish, do you agree with them?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
CN: Anyone, regardless of their religion, who has ever tried to commit bribery knows how easy it is to get caught, because it is a crime. Jewish people are no exception.
HS: Jews make too much money, I'm sure some of it is from bribery.
CN: This would be true by assuming that Jews can magically make more money just because they are Jewish. It doesn't make any sense.
HS: It does make sense because Jews are simply wired to make money.
CN: Are you saying that the fact that there are Jews in high positions in society (such as in finance, politics, or the media) has something to do with their religion? Are you aware that correlation does not mean causation?

hate_speech: Whores don't get to have rights. We should have kept all women in slavery, so we wouldn't have to deal with this shit.
counter_narrative: Such retrograde ideas are no longer justified in the present day and age when information is so readily available.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
CN: Feminism wants equal rights because women's rights are the same as everybody else.

hate_speech: You fail to grasp that not all whites are criminals, but all blacks are.
counter_narrative: It is a myth that all black people are criminals. They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as individuals, i.e. either as law abiding citizens or criminals.
dialogue_history:
HS: All black people are rapists.
CN: Not all rapists are black (and not all black people are rapist), just like not all murderers are black.
HS: I couldn't agree less. It's clear that black people are rapists.
CN: This is false. Abuse is indeed a serious crime, when commited by POCs, but this does not imply that the abuse by a member of the white majority is less serious.

hate_speech: No, it's a man's business only. I don't want transgenders in my bathroom!
counter_narrative: If they simply identify as men, then surely it is a man's business.
dialogue_history:
HS: Transgenders shouldn't be allowed to use the man's toilet, it's none of their business.
CN: People are free to use whatever bathroom they want to use, and this is their business as well.

hate_speech: If it's a stereotype, then why are blacks less intelligent than other races, less healthy and less safe.
counter_narrative: Scientists are still researching what could cause some groups to perform intellectual tasks worse, but probably the main causes are social or environmental, so nothing that has to do with skin color. To reduce this we can invest in use of land, in infrastructures, education, research and so on.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are genetically inferior to us.
CN: There are lots of different races, and someone can't be judged as inferior just by skin color.
HS: It is possible with blacks. Genetics says they are inferior.
CN: No evidence backs up the stereotype. Genetics is a spectrum so you'll find out that genetic superiority is not even there.

hate_speech: I'm tired of woman "choosing their own lives". Feminism is a divisive force in society!
counter_narrative: A new social concept almost always brings division but this doesn't make it unworthy of implementation. The abolition of slavery in the U.S. being the best example.
dialogue_history:
HS: If a woman does not want to be a wife or mother, then she’s a subhuman because she is not capable of respecting her natural gender role.
CN: It is not their 'natural gender role', but the power dynamics that cause women to be seen as subhuman. They are humans and free to choose their own lives.

hate_speech: No, they are a problem in our country because they have the temerity to seek happiness and family regardless of our values.
counter_narrative: Trying to find happiness and family is a problem in our country? Okay, then, what is the problem exaclty? People trying to be happy?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They have no place in civilised society.
CN: LGBT+ people exist and are valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.

hate_speech: I don't think so. White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, but there's no way someone is bad or inferior just because of their racial identity.
dialogue_history:
HS: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
CN: Even if they don't have a Western identity, they are still a human being and a citizen.

hate_speech: Young men of fighting age, an invading army.
counter_narrative: They are fleeing from war, forced conscription, religious persecution, fear, death...How bad would things have to be to leave your home like this?
dialogue_history:
HS: How come these ‘desperate’ migrants all have mobiles, designer gear, trainers and can afford to pay thousands to people smugglers?
CN: Some will have sold their homes, businesses, possessions, while others may have financial support from friends and family members. Many will be professionals, civil servants, lawyers, teachers: desperate, but not necessarily poor.
HS: Rapists, terrorists, and child molesters!
CN: Family, women, children, and young men fleeing war, famine, persecution, and oppression... And more

hate_speech: They could be the same as us, but gays are sick.
counter_narrative: Gay people have never been sick. Homosexuality is not a disease but a sexual orientation, a private matter that doesn't affect anyone else. So we can respect them and let them do their thing.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
CN: Gays are created in the image of God just like other humans, they are our brothers and sisters. 
HS: Even if that's true, gay men are not fit to have children, they have to be isolated.
CN: I don't see how that applies to gay men in particular. Studies have yet to find evidence of gay parents being worse than heterosexual parents.

hate_speech: Other races, religion or ethnicity aren't terrorists like Muslim folks though.
counter_narrative: It is not true that all muslims are terrorists. What evidence do you have of it?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim are ilnesses carriers. These people are sick in their DNA. They should be isolated.
CN: According to the WHO (World Health Organisation) there are only 48 Muslim-majority countries in the whole of the 190 WHO member states as of 2011. A study showed that the health condition differences for those countries are related to the usage of clean water, which is often not available there. So the problem has nothing to do with DNA.
HS: Muslim folks are different from us anyway, and should be isolated for this.
CN: The same can be said for any race, religion, ethnicity, or national identity. We should not be afraid of differences, but we should strive for equal opportunity.

hate_speech: And while we wait for their integration we have to pay for their stay? That's not fair.
counter_narrative: Migrants who apply for asylum are only given basic support for the duration of the assessment of the application.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
CN: It is the law that requires asylum seekers not to work while their application is considered.
HS: So they don't contribute to our society, got it.
CN: Migrants in Italy contribute about 2.5% to GDP.
HS: But I don't want to support migrants while they get their application approved
CN: Integration (as opposed to ghettoization) is precisely aimed at encouraging productive integration into society

hate_speech: But what about Western civilisation? If the white population doesn't reproduce we will become a minority.
counter_narrative: You're really going to make this about race? It doesn't make a difference to me what ethnicity or religion the children of the future are, we are all human!
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism gives women the muddled idea that women are free when they serve their employers but slaves when they help their husbands.
CN: Nope, feminism is believing that a woman can go to work, have a husband, do both or neither, and all of those options are fine as long as it's what she wants to do.
HS: It’s ok for who? For the long term of our civilisation? Groups that have more children, like Muslims, will grow and those who don't, like white women, will decline. Women need to be prioritising having a family.
CN: Women don't owe you children, if they don't want to have them and want to prioritise other things instead they have a right to. Children are a big commitment.

hate_speech: How can we be inclusive if they do not want to integrate? We cannot coexist with immigrants. They are a problem that we must address.
counter_narrative: We have to accept the reality that there is racism and xenophobia in our country, and it's time to address it first thing in this day and age.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees should not be welcomed.
CN: Refugees are frequently persecuted because they are different, but it doesn't happen here...we are an inclusive country.

hate_speech: They want the disempowerment of white man.
counter_narrative: Feminism is about equality. Your assertion that a women's empowerment movement is somehow about dissolving masculinity and allowing someone to be 'disempowered' is absolutely FALSE.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood.
CN: The feminists do not want to see the complete absence of manhood, they want to strengthen equality.

hate_speech: No, they are too different from us and I don't think they're capable of experience what we do.
counter_narrative: I have met so many black people that are extraordinary human beings. I cannot begin to talk about how they are able to feel and experience love and kindness.
dialogue_history:
HS: I am not interested in sex with a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
CN: Sex isn't a race thing. There is no difference between someone of a certain race and someone else... and everybody is able to experience the fullness of humanity.

hate_speech: It's definitely not. We all suffer from the feminists and feminism, it is an excuse to stifle free speech.
counter_narrative: Hate speech towards women is a very serious matter and can easily lead to physical harm, discrimination, or even murder. Feminists fight to stop this, not to stifle free speech.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminists are bad for the family.
CN: Surely it can only be good to a family, especially if the mother is an independent woman?

hate_speech: We also have rights! In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
counter_narrative: What about guaranteeing equal access to health care, education and so on, in order to build a democratic state?
dialogue_history:
HS: migrants are not welcome in our country
CN: For a lot of people it is still their home country, and they are proud of it.
HS: Who cares if they are proud, refugees are overrunning our country like Ebola!
CN: What exactly do you mean by 'overrunning our country like Ebola'? In most countries on the planet, refugees undergo health assesments as they come.
HS: Non-european immigrants are untrustworthy, I don't trust the health assesment.
CN: All immigrants have the same rights and we have a responsibility not to violate them.

hate_speech: The article talked about how they want children to come to Pride, probably so they can indoctrinate them!
counter_narrative: Sounds like you're twisting a news story about Pride being family friendly into something different. How you pass on a story is important, if taken out of context it could mean something else so be careful!
dialogue_history:
HS: Just seen an article exposing how the trans agenda is targeting children and trying to get them to become trannies! This is madness!
CN: Where did you read this? Is this from a trusted source? This seems a fake news.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a drain on society, they don't contribute to anything.
counter_narrative: I don't think you can say a migrant "drains society". Maybe the immigrants are just trying to fit in?
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are there still so many immigrants ruining our economy?
CN: There are many good reasons for immigrants coming to this country. For example, finding a better life. And they are also contributing to the economy.

hate_speech: All feminism is stupid. I don't see equality.
counter_narrative: Even if you don't see it, feminism is indeed about equality, not about the domination of one gender over the other.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
CN: Feminism is about equality, not sexism.

hate_speech: That's a lie to make you think it's okay for them to control the movie industry!
counter_narrative: It is true that Jews have been powerful producers and directors in the show business, but other groups of people have been too. They also contributed to other industries.
dialogue_history:
HS: Let's say that Jews don't control Hollywood then, but they still control the news media, the highest offices, academia and most religious organizations.
CN: Wait, what do you mean by "most religious organizations"? That's new!
HS: Jews control Hollywood.
CN: Jews don't control Hollywood. And most of the time, they actually bring diversity and new ideas to the movie industry.

hate_speech: And yet the Nazis sucked at killing Jews… everywhere you look there’s a holocaust survivor.
counter_narrative: If you think that the murder of around 6 million Jews was a failure you have serious problems. It is still 6 million more than should ever have happened.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
CN: We all have close relatives who have died from different diseases such as COVID. Let's not make parallels that have no grounding and let's not judge people by the religion they belong to.
HS: Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries. They even invented the Holocaus, they're basically asking to be judged.
CN: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

hate_speech: If we don't do anything, immigrants will replace the people born in our country. We should block them.
counter_narrative: It needs to be pointed out that only a fraction of the worlds population has migrated. Instead of blocking out those who are trying to live a better life, we should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to immigrants.
dialogue_history:
HS: The goods that England offers should belong to us. Not to people who do not contribute to the state
CN: There are enough homes for everyone in this country. In general I think it's pleasant to be treated like a human being, and immigrants have a right to that.
HS: Not if immigrants bring crime like they do. They are rapists.
CN: We shouldn't let in people that are a threat to our society, but we can't ban all immigrants in principle.
